title: New Supplier Onboarding
description: A new supplier for seat foam has been selected and needs to be set up in the procurement and logistics systems.

tasks.description: Gather all necessary information for the new supplier (company name, address, contact info, banking details, tax ID).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all required data points.

tasks.description: Create a new vendor profile in the master supplier database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new supplier record.

tasks.description: Configure the logistics system with the supplier's shipping location and lead times to enable automated parts ordering.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the supplier in the logistics platform.
